attributes.action: give an undertaking to the people of this country that should Mr Speaker be ousted from his position because he has failed then he WILL NOT take with him a huge pension and severance payments which make him a continuing drain on the public purse.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Michael Martin has failed and therefore should be sacked and if he is sacked then he should be the first political sacking in the history of Nu-Labour since 1997 to be sacked without the benefit of huge pension and severance payments, making his sacking a non-event as far as he is concerned but a betrayal and an affront to the taxpayers of this country.  The man has failed.  He should NOT benefit from being sacked for failure.
